comment._content: Rene Francois Joseph de Warren - he appeared to be quite the romantic, according to this 1914 news article.

comment._content: New York Times, April 29, 1914: The Duke sues a title-doubter for libel: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9907E0D81E39E6...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The spaces round the hyphen should probably be eliminated.  "Surrey" is the second part of his hyphenated name, not an indication of any of the places named "Surrey."

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: According to the NY Times article located by Wystan, this was the title he ascribed to himself, though there were plenty of questions.
